alert.note: Alert for Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:54PM EDT until September 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COOS COUNTY... At 553 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pittsburg, or 23 miles southwest of Coburn Gore, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg. This also includes... First Connecticut Lake, Second Connecticut Lake, and Third Connecticut Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
